page.title: 07The Methodist Church
page.content: There are three churches in Cleobury Mortimer. The Reverend Parry has been a Minister in the Methodist Church since 1961 and has been here in Cleobury since 1978. Mr. Parry told us that there are fifty-four members of the church and about fifty worship there every Sunday, showing that the members of the church are very loyal. The services on Sunday are usually with the Reverend Parry, but sometimes there is a visiting preacher. To be a member of the church you have to believe in God and Jesus, and want to be a servant of them and love them. The Reverend Parry has to take three different services at three different churches each Sunday. The Methodist Church has a very flourishing Sunday School.
